channel.title: Questions! help please?
channel.description:
1.) I was wanting to be able to increase some of my skills max level from 99.. for example i could change strength from 99 to 110(and also maybe be able to hit higher with the strength bonus)
2.) When I go and make someone's rights from say 1 to 3... Do I have to compile for them to take action? Any ideas?
Thanks

item.title: Questions! help please?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“Magnite7, post:1, topic:237250”]1.) I was wanting to be able to increase some of my skills max level from 99… for example i could change strength from 99 to 110(and also maybe be able to hit higher with the strength bonus)

2.) When I go and make someone’s rights from say 1 to 3… Do I have to compile for them to take action?
Any ideas?

Thanks[/quote]
The above post answered your question.
However, when you make someone an admin, mod, etc, make sure there LOGGED OUT when you save the file.
There is no need for compiling unless your using 503+

Read full topic

item.title: Questions! help please?
item.dc:creator: @cj_howat cj_howat@hotmail.com
item.description:
@cj_howat wrote:

no you dont and to change your max stats go into client.java and search for

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2008, 10:53:59 pm[/size][hr]and then for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}
}
return 99;

}

Then you should see
CODE
lvl <=99;
and
CODE
return 99;

Change 99 in both Codes to the Max Stat you want.

Read full topic
